name: ☆Catch the ball!☆
description: Welcome to ,,☆Catch the ball!☆" game! All you have to do id to: ☆Press  the orange START button to get started.  ☆The object of the game is not to let the ball of thread touch the pink carpet, by moving the mouse cursor (or finger in case you are on the phone).  ☆CAREFUL! You only have 3 lives. If you waste them, on the screen, a message will appear. If you want to try the game again, click on the green flag again.
